story.text: The [[Outlandish Academy]] is a P2P framework for creating online and offline learning experiences. To talk to us please drop into one of:

# Drop in

- To our chat - [https://vector.im/beta/#/room/#fedwiki:matrix.org vector.im]
- Face chat - [https://appear.in/fedwiki https://appear.in/fedwiki appear.in]
